com.ToolBox.currency

Class ExchangerRateRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ToolBox.currency.ExchangerRateRecord

  • public class ExchangerRateRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    记录汇率 初始为内置汇率 从网上获取最新汇率
    Author:
    杨弘

        public Currency[] getRates()
